nodes.text: Trade Federation Factory Turrets were defensive laser cannon emplacements. In use during 32 BBY, they were placed to protect a droid factory on Eos. Although the turrets had limited firing arcs, the Trade Federation placed them strategically near the factory to protect all points. Many were destroyed when the pirate Nym, mercenaries Vana Sage and Reti, and Royal escort pilot Rhys Dallows launched a retaliatory strike on the factory.

The TF Factory Turrets appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Starfighter. Although the player is not required to destroy the turrets, the strategy guide recommends doing so to prevent their craft's destruction.
